problem.statementHtml: Find the probability density function (PDF) of a Gamma distribution with shape parameter k and rate parameter θ.
hints: Hint: Use the definition of the Gamma function
problem.solutionHtml:
To find the PDF, we can use the following steps:

  • Step 1: Recall that the Gamma function is defined as \[\Gamma(x) = \int_0^\infty t^{x-1}e^{-t} dt\].
  • Step 2: Substitute x with k and θ with θ in the definition of the Gamma function.
  • Step 3: Simplify the expression to obtain the PDF.
